roleset.name: to wander aimlessly
roleset.note: MAUNDER-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to PB, VN and sense groupings. No appropriate VN entry found. (from maunder.01-v)

example.name: Typical usage
example.text: I can see her old grim visage now as she maundered about the kitchen.

example.name: With manner
example.text: He maundered through life without a single ambition.

roleset.name: to talk indistinctly or senselessly
roleset.note: MAUNDER-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to PB, VN and sense groupings. No appropriate VN entry found. (from maunder.02-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He maundered to himself, "The daughter of one of these politicians!"
example.arg: The daughter of one of these politicians!

example.name: With manner
example.text: He maundered terribly all through his lecture.

example.name: With PP topic
example.text: She maundered about the assassination of President Kennedy.
example.arg: about the assassination of President Kennedy
